name: get_streamer_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitch_api.
Tool description: Detailed API for twitch. Stream data, streamer data, chat data, streamer cards data etc.
for twitch.
API description: Retrieves information about a Twitch streamer using the provided channel name.

channel.description: The name of the Twitch channel for which information is being retrieved.
